relation: It is a nice environment. Instructors are very helpful. I love the fact that you can meet with them one on one and also get extra help with great tutoring staff.
pageTitle: Linn-Benton Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 08/18/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 1 of 29 Daniel from Sweet Home, OR Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Bang for the buck What else can i say besides LBCC will save you loads of cash. Not only cause their tuition is cheap but they have tons and tons of scholarships to offer. LBCC keeps getting better and better for me! Am enjoying being here When I was in High School I dreaded waking up in the morning I felt as if others things were more important! I was always nervous about attending college. But since i have been at LBCC It makes me look back and appreciate what i dealt with in High School. I love college and enjoy it so much at LBCC i will more then likely miss attending this school once I graduate from it or transfer to another. Am learning a lot When I enrolled to LBCC I really thought nothing of it. In my head I just thought oh look more school. But after the first year at LBCC I have learned so much and respect and thank every professor I have had and will have in the near future. Thank you LBCC for all the help you have given me!
